notInstalledErrorText.message: Firefox Launch requires Firefox to be installed on your computer.

welcomePageSubtitleFirefox.message: Switch between browsers in one click.

welcomePageDescriptionFirefox.message:
Sometimes, you just want to use a different browser.
This extension helps you easily open sites in other browsers.

welcomePageSubtitleChromium.message: Switch from your current browser to Firefox in one click.

welcomePageDescriptionChromium.message: Sometimes, you just want a more private browser. This extension helps you easily open sites in Firefox.

welcomePageAlwaysPrivateCheckboxChromium.message: Always open sites in a Firefox Private window when switching

welcomePageTelemetryCheckbox.message: Allow Mozilla to collect information about how you use this extension so we can make it better. {LinkStart}Privacy Notice{LinkEnd}

welcomePageNoShortcutsFirefox.message: You don't have any shortcuts set up for this extension. Create them by going to {LinkStart}Extensions{LinkEnd} > click the gear icon > Manage Extension Shortcuts

welcomePageNoShortcutsChromium.message: You don't have any shortcuts set up for this extension. Create them by going to {LinkStart}extension settings.{LinkEnd}

welcomePageNoShortcutTo.message: You don't have a shortcut set up for launching your current page in $browser$

welcomePageManageShortcutsFirefox.message: Manage shortcuts for this extension by going to {LinkStart}Extensions{LinkEnd} > click the gear icon > Manage Extension Shortcuts

welcomePageManageShortcutsChromium.message: Manage shortcuts for this extension by going to {LinkStart}extension settings.{LinkEnd}

welcomePageTryFirefox.message: Want to Launch in Firefox? {LinkStart}Try our Chromium extension.{LinkEnd}

welcomePageTryChromium.message: Launch another browser with our {LinkStart}extension in Firefox.{LinkEnd}
